Monster Slaying.name: Monster Slaying
descriptions: Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 1%.
Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 2% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 2%.
Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 3% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 3%.
Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 4% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 4%.
Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 5% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 5%.

Humanoid Slaying.name: Humanoid Slaying
descriptions: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 1%.
Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 2% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 2%.
Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 3% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 3%.
Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 4% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 4%.
Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 5% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 5%.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 1%.
Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 3%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 5%.

Entrapment.name: Entrapment
descriptions: Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 5% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 seconds.
Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 10% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 seconds.
Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 15% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 seconds.
Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 20% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 seconds.
Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 25% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 seconds.

Savage Strikes.name: Savage Strikes
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by 20%.

Ensnare.name: Ensnare
descriptions: Gives your Wing Clip ability a 20% chance to reduce the target's attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 40% chance to reduce the target's attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 60% chance to reduce the target's attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 80% chance to reduce the target's attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.
Gives your Wing Clip ability a 100% chance to reduce the target's attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.

Trap Mastery.name: Trap Mastery
descriptions: Decreases the chance enemies will resist trap effects by 5%, reduces the cooldown of all traps by 25%, and increases the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 15%.
Decreases the chance enemies will resist trap effects by 10%, reduces the cooldown of all traps by 50%, and increases the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 30%.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
descriptions: Increases total health by 4%.
Increases total health by 8%.
Increases total health by 12%.
Increases total health by 16%.
Increases total health by 20%.

Deterrence.name: Deterrence
descriptions: When activated, increases your Dodge and Parry chance by 25% for 10 seconds.

Trapper's Net.name: Trapper's Net
descriptions: The Hunter casts his net at the target area. If an enemy is struck, they will be ensnared for 5 seconds and pulled to the Hunter if able. The enemy will be forced to attack the Hunter for the duration of the ensnare.

Surefooted.name: Surefooted
descriptions: Increases hit chance by 1% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 5%.
Increases hit chance by 2% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 10%.
Increases hit chance by 3% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 15%.

Dangerous Game.name: Dangerous Game
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Feign Death ability by 10 sec, and the chance it will be resisted by 8%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Feign Death ability by 15 sec, and the chance it will be resisted by 16%.

Killer Instinct.name: Killer Instinct
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 1%.
Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 3%.

Disengage.name: Disengage
descriptions: Attempts to disengage from the target, vaulting backwards. Reduces threat by a large amount. Character exits combat mode.

Lightning Reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
descriptions: Increases your Agility by 4%.
Increases your Agility by 8%.
Increases your Agility by 12%.
Increases your Agility by 16%.
Increases your Agility by 20%.

Primal Hunter.name: Primal Hunter
descriptions: Increases the range of your melee attacks and abilities while wielding a Polearm or Staff by 5 yards, and causes your thrown attacks to apply Lacerate to the enemy, increasing damage taken by 1%. Stacks up to 5 times.
